item.title: About Nicola Massarenti
item.author: Nicola Massarenti
item.description: I am a Machine Learning Engineer with experience in MLOps, solution architecture design, data engineering and software development. I am passionate about building products and MVPs that solve real-world problems. I have experience in consulting companies as well as in product companies. I have delivered projects to customers in the edge AI, energy, fashion, banking and retail industries. I have experience with Cloud-based development (GCP, AWS) as well as on-premises.
